DIA_Hobo_02_QA305_Found_03_01: Araxos' dog sniffed out the trail. Impressive. I thought only your hunters could do that.
DIA_Hobo_02_QA305_Found_15_02: Not only them. And they're not the only ones who can deal with thieves quickly.
DIA_Hobo_02_QA305_Found_03_04: Let's go to the others, maybe the sounds of a blacksmith's hammer won't be so annoying after all.
